one_reviews_text: So this is the best VR runner you can currently experience.  The visuals are trippy.  The music is good.  The game is non-stressful.  You can begin from certain checkpoints even when you fail.  Game restarts quickly and right where the song left off.

review_title: Better gfx before the inca theme
one_reviews_text: A good game, played maybe 2-3 hours in total. Will maybe play more. Update to the inca theme and name change made the graphics look out of place, I liked it better before.
It's one of my favourite VR games. The music rocks and the visuals are nuts. It has a ton of levels, so it's great value for money.

Endless runner type game that, very uncomfortably, uses you neck tilt to steer. Would have probably given it another start or two if you could navigate with the gamepad. Otherwise just going through a tunnel trying to avoid things. Only real positive is the music is quite good.
